aboutPreview.title: About Me
aboutPreview.description: I am a Ph.D. Candidate in Political Science at Stony Brook University, studying how democracies can govern artificial intelligence. My dissertation, "Three Essays on the Political Implications of AI," examines how citizens form preferences about emerging technologies.
